summary: Completed comprehensive testing of 4 new features: separate lb/oz weight inputs, Remember me checkbox, year selector restrictions (2026+), and date picker restrictions (2026 only). Most features working correctly with one issue found in Remember me persistence.

ui_bugs.issue: Remember me checkbox saves credentials to localStorage during login but credentials are not persisted after logout
ui_bugs.details: The localStorage.setItem() works during login, but credentials are not loaded back into form fields after logout. The useEffect hook may not be properly loading remembered credentials on component mount.

passed_tests: Add Catch form shows separate lb and oz input fields when lb/oz unit is selected
Add Catch form shows single kg input when kg unit is selected
Weight calculation works correctly (25 lb 8 oz displays as '25 lb 8 oz' in catch cards)
Weight input fields switch properly between kg and lb/oz modes
Remember me checkbox appears on login form with correct label
Remember me checkbox can be checked and unchecked
Date picker correctly restricted to 2026-01-01 to 2026-12-31 range
Date picker allows selecting future dates in 2026
Catch submission works with lb/oz weight values
Catch submission works with future dates in 2026
Navigation between all tabs works correctly
Weight display format shows 'X lb Y oz' correctly in catch cards
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Remember me functionality: The localStorage save/load mechanism is not working properly. Credentials are saved during login but not loaded back into form fields after logout. Check the useEffect hook in App.js lines 108-115 for proper loading of remembered credentials.
